item.description:
Lets meet for some Sushi after work and later for some exciting Latin dancing in Cambridge. Parking is free and the location is convienient for many commuters. The Hotel as well as it's facilities are both cozy and inviting. Located next to both MicroCenter and Trader Joe's, I have always found Club Caribe to be a fun and recomendable experience to both novice and experienced dancers alike.

-=-=-=-

Mixed Latin Dance Lessons at 8pm with MetaMovements
Salsa Lessons at 9pm with MetaMovements
Dancing from 10:00-1am+
Full cash bar
Free Garage & Lot
Free hors d'oeuvres
$12.00 for Admission and additional $5 per lesson
item.how_to_find_us: Join us at Bisuteki for some Sushi before the dance lesson upstairs
item.name: Sushi and Salsa by the Charles River
